name: Koishi Fumo
description:
You can play this game on the Scratch website here if you want to :

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/723472400/

Warning : 

This game has loud noises and jumpscares! If you're under 10, don't report this game and leave immediately.

ALSO : I don't own Touhou, nor FNAF. This game is also going to have sequels.

Story : 

You've decided to do an attempt to summon a group of aggressive Koishi Fumos that are the size of a human as a prank to gain views. At the middle of the night you hear a strange noise. Did you actually summon a group of aggressive Koishi Fumos?

Credits :

Scott Cawthon : FNAF

FluffleKitten (Scratch User) : Koishi Fumo Model

Music & Sounds go to their respective owners.
